backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functions defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variable definitions providing light/dark themes and design tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, fonts, and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the router in a ThemeProvider to control light/dark mode and render the app.
Renders the brand logo with a fallback text mark if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/content/ContentR: Renders structured content blocks including headings, paragraphs, lists, and emphasis.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying brand info, navigation shortcuts, and responsive link sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with brand logo, desktop dropdown navigation, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper providing header, footer, and main content outlet.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Renders the homepage hero section with background image, headline, description, and CTA buttons.
Provides a mapping of page IDs to their source Google Docs URLs and helper functions to retrieve them.
frontend/src/content/contentTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript types for content blocks, sections, and page content structures.
frontend/src/content/pages.ts: Stores static page content definitions, including sections, text blocks, and lists for various solution pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth provider and hook for loading, logging in, and clearing user identities.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageTitle.ts: Sets the document title based on the page title and app brand, restoring the previous title on unmount.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes and industry-specific theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app, wrapping it with query and identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/ContentPage.tsx: Renders a dynamic content page with optional industry theming, banner image, and section-based content rendering.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero section and a grid of AV solution cards, setting the page title from brand metadata.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a 404 not found page with an illustration and a button linking back home.
frontend/src/router/router.tsx: Defines all application routes using TanStack Router, mapping paths to ContentPage or specific page components.
frontend/src/site/brand.ts: Exports brand constants including name, domain, logo info, and contact details.
frontend/src/site/industryThemes.ts: Provides theme color configurations per industry and a helper to fetch a theme by page ID.
frontend/src/site/navigation.ts: Defines the site's navigation structure with nested items and a utility to flatten all routes.
frontend/src/site/pageBanners.ts: Maps page IDs to banner images and alt text for hero sections across the site.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and loading core plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, theming requirements, logo fallback needs, and lists existing and requested features for industryâ€‘specific color schemes and placeholder logo handling.
